name: Heroes in the Dice
description:
Heroes in the Dice

Is a game made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam.

The theme is "Roll Of the Dice".

How to play:

Player 1 : Arrows to move and Enter to attack.

Player 2: WASD and Space to Attack

Orange Dices Buffs you, but you lost -1 points.

Purple Dices Debuffs you and gives you 3 points.

Hero Dices change your character and gives you 1 point.
